definition: to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Permafrost problems are the core of the three principal technical difficulties in the Qinghai-Tibet railway construction.
sentences.chinese: 青藏铁路建设三大技术难题的核心是冻土问题。

sentences.english: They broke the hard frozen earth with picks.
sentences.chinese: 他们用镐把坚硬的冻土凿开。

sentences.english: What should people living in permafrost areas be doing to adapt to these changes?
sentences.chinese: 住在永冻土区域的人们应该做着什么适应这些变动？

sentences.english: Were parasitized larvae overwinter in the frozen soil layer below, known as winter worm.
sentences.chinese: 被寄生的幼虫在冻土层以下越冬，称为冬虫。

sentences.english: How will the life cycles of the tundra be affected?
sentences.chinese: 冻土带的生命循环将受到怎样的影响呢？

sentences.english: Finnaly, the method of designing frozen wall as presented.
sentences.chinese: 并讨论了冻土挡墙的设计方法。

sentences.english: The construction techniques for culverts in plateau permafrost regions are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了高原多年冻土区各类涵洞施工工艺。

sentences.english: The presence of sea ice and of permafrost helps protect Arctic barrier islands for much of the year.
sentences.chinese: 海冰和冻土层的出现很多年来帮助保护了北极障壁岛。

sentences.english: As the permafrost melts, the land loses its capacity to absorb water.
sentences.chinese: 由于冻土融化，陆地会失去吸水性。

sentences.english: The altiplano tundra is a potential source of the formation and preservation of nature gas hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 高原冻土带是天然气水合物生成和保存的潜在源区。

sentences.english: Permafrost is soil, often water-rich, that is below freezing.
sentences.chinese: 永久冻土通常具有冰点以下的丰富水资源。

sentences.english: The theoretical basis for reinforcing of dynamic compaction in winter and treating the frozen soil layer is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了关于冬季强夯加固处理冻土层的理论依据。

sentences.english: The distribution of momaximumst frozen soil depth is that the southern Bazhou to be shallower than the northern.
sentences.chinese: 巴州平原地区冬季最大冻土深度南浅北深。

sentences.english: The result indicates embankment berm on permafrost region should not be regarded as the main measure to improve thermal stability of embankment.
sentences.chinese: 冻土路基护道不应作为提高路基热稳定性的主要措施。

sentences.english: Fenghuoshan Tunnel is the highest frozen earth tunnel in the world.
sentences.chinese: 风火山隧道是目前世界上海拔最高的冻土隧道。

sentences.english: The forest is dark green, while the tundra is still brown.
sentences.chinese: 森林是深绿色，而冻土带仍然是黄褐色。

definition: to freeze over (of water or land)
to freeze over/to ice over/icebound/to shelve (a proposal etc)
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
